Detailed Description

Sending logging information to daemon that stores it in some medium (for example database system)

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum cdaemonlog::cmd
 

commands

Enumeration values:
cmd_write  store information
cmd_dom_log_read_log  read history for domain
cmd_dom_log_cnt_log  count entries in history for domain
cmd_log_read_dom_log  read table log
cmd_log_cnt_dom_log  count entries in table log for given domain and login

enum clogger::result [inherited]
 

status of authorization/login

Enumeration values:
re_ok  success
re_read  can't read data
re_data  invalid data (domain, username, password)
re_pass  invalid password, description includes given password
re_int  internal error
re_blk  user's blocked
